mention.text: `` Kiev -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - A fierce battle was underway on Monday in Ukraine 's rebellious east after a pro-Russian militia attacked a Ukrainian border post with automatic weapons and grenade launchers in the early hours .
the border post on the southern edge of Luhansk
